data.eml:eml: Discovery of a cavernicolous trechine species from the Sanwang Dong-Erwang Dong cave system, Wulong, Chongqing, southwestern China (Coleoptera Carabidae: Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Mengzhen, Ma, Zijun, Tian, Mingyi (2019): Discovery of a cavernicolous trechine species from the Sanwang Dong-Erwang Dong cave system, Wulong, Chongqing, southwestern China (Coleoptera Carabidae: Trechinae). Zootaxa 4668 (1): 105-114, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.1.6
